thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 7 of 1692
thread.title: Doris

author: Doris
title: Doris
text: As always, I should have booked earlier for a better rate but....When I finally did take the plunge, as I have done in the past with Flighthub, all went well, except....I was not happy with the way Manulife Insurance is a default and thus, was shocked to see that the total was almost CAD$200.00 more than expected. I then had to call your 24 hr service, where I did not have to wait too long (5 minutes) and was taken very well care of. The young man, Eddy, was able to take the insurance off and when I received my Email ticket, I was pleased to see the correct amount and trust that this amount will be on my credit card. Otherwise, I will see how the actual flight goes in June, 2017 but trust all will go well.
